info.name: PortableApps forum comments
info.description: Reduces the vertical space loss on  forum comments of PortableApps.com.
info.additionalInfo:
Except for comment header link text color, no colors are changed. This header bothered me.
I use this in addition to this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/60668/portableapps-com-clean
to remove the donate message, add "p.sitewide-news-banner {display: none!important;}"
